scripts.install-on-sublime: cp ./build/times-square-dark-variable.sublime-color-scheme ~/Library/Application\ Support/Sublime\ Text\ 3/Packages/User && cp ./build/times-square-dark-fixed.sublime-color-scheme ~/Library/Application\ Support/Sublime\ Text\ 3/Packages/User && cp ./build/times-square-dark.sublime-theme ~/Library/Application\ Support/Sublime\ Text\ 3/Packages/User
